item.title: Tech NEWS 2020-10-29
item.description: Apple search engine efforts ‘stepping up’ as Google deal under threat (4 minute read) Apple has been working on its Applebot crawler since before 2015, and with Google under investigation for antitrust practices, it may have to put it to use.
